title: Ukrainians Turn to Diaries for Solace, and to Share Life in Wartime
description: Writers have long used diaries to make sense of life. Now, diaries can be shared in real time, helping shape public perception of events as they unfold — including war.
dc:creator: Nina Siegal
media:description: A portrait of a volunteer of Kyiv’s Zoo Patrol, by Mila Teshaieva. Teshaieva went from Berlin to Kyiv, her hometown, when the war started, and recorded her impressions in diary entries and photos.
